#Installation instructions for Linux tarball

assuming you have make tools and gtk installed...


~ sudo apt-get update
~ sudo apt-get install libnotify0.4-cil
~ wget http://xbmcontrol-evo.googlecode.com/files/xbmcontrol-evo-0.1.tar.gz
~ tar xz xbmcontrol-evo-0.1.tar.gz
~ cd xbmcontrol-evo-0.1
~ ./configure
~ make
~ sudo make install
